descriptionlist.description: Minecraft: Java Edition has landed on iOS! Meet PojavLauncher--a port of the work done for Android to bring Java Edition to iDevices.
Compatible with Vanilla, Forge (some versions), and Fabric 1.6.1 to 21w09a!
Credit to the PojavLauncherTeam and DuyKhanhTran for creating this masterpiece.
Check out the PojavLauncher GitHub at https://bit.ly/2PgpexZ.
